meanings.sent1: The musician played beautiful melodies on the crwths.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of musicians playing crwths at the festival.
meanings.sent3: The crwths seemed to have a mind of their own, dancing to the music.
meanings.sent4: The crwths whispered ancient tunes from centuries past.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the crwths echoed through the halls, enchanting all who listened.

meanings.sent3: The crwths in the room seemed to be having a secret meeting.
